description: A comprehensive weather MCP server that provides real-time weather information using OpenWeatherMap API. Supports weather queries by city name or coordinates, with detailed meteorological data including temperature, humidity, wind, pressure, and astronomical information.
name: io.github.Omarigato/WeatherMcpServer

environment_variables.name: dafefe76bbed2c90f4d89aa8784436a4
environment_variables.description: API key for OpenWeatherMap service. Get your free API key at https://openweathermap.org/api
